description: This table contains general history information for each type of medication warning or advisory. Since each warning could be triggered in different activities at different times, it contains general warning information for each time the warning was triggered. This table is an extension of ALT_HISTORY table.

columns.name: ALT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the med alert record.

columns.name: ALT_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all alerts in the system.

columns.name: FILTEROUT_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Save the reason that the medication warning is filtered.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Previously overridden - releasing orders


User Marked To Be Filtered

columns.name: TPN_VOL_INFUSED
columns.description: It is possible to calculate warnings for total parenteral nutrition (TPN) based on the total volume present in the bag or the volume based upon how much the patient will actually receive. If the volume to be infused to the patient is being calculated, then this item will store the volume to be infused at the time that a TPN alert fired. If the warning is based on the volume in the TPN bag, then this item will not be set.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CRIT_DOSE_POPUP_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not a dose warning was saved from the critical dose warning popup.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: HARD_STOP_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not a warning is a hard stop.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CRIT_DOSE_POPUP_YN

columns.name: DRUGSTUDY_SEVERITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the severity of a drug-study warning that is shown in the medication warnings popup.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Investigational med interaction


Potential study disqualification


Risk to investigational medication efficacy

columns.name: NBA_ACTION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant of an next best action event.

columns.name: NBA_USER_ID
columns.description: The user correlated with this next best action event.

columns.name: NBA_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The department correlated with this next best action event.

columns.name: NBA_RESULT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The result of this next best action event.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Accepted


In Progress


Deferred


Declined


Viewed

columns.name: NBA_DFR_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The defer reason correlated with this next best action event.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: NBA_DFR_DAYS_NUM
columns.description: The defer days correlated with this next best action event.

columns.name: NBA_DEC_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The decline reason correlated with this next best action event.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: NBA_COMM_ID
columns.description: The contact correlated with this next best action event.

columns.name: NBA_BUSINESS_SEG_ID
columns.description: The next best action was performed in this business segment.

columns.name: NBA_ACTION_DTTM
columns.description: The instant of a next best action event in local time.

columns.name: MYC_TICKLER_AUDIT_CSN_ID
columns.description: The CSN of the RCH record containing the auditing data of the tickler sent for this alert.
